title: New player cant select any champs in champion slection
body:
We cant see any champions during champion selections after the upadates..
how are we able to play game???

replies.body: I've been told that you have to buy champs to play otherwise you can't play now? Is this RIOTS stupid new way of making $$$ of people wanting to play a supposedly "free to play game" I am having the exact same issue

Wrong. The New Player Champion Rotation was slightly changed so that new players have a different set from the weekly rotating list. Once you hit level 10, you get the normal rotation again. I have some guys looking into this now to make sure everything is still working properly.
I've personally noticed a few reports of this happening, but only on OCE after the patch. I've got one of my OCE leads already on the case, and we should have more info soon!!
